sentences.sContent: Would it be too extravagant to buy both?
sentences.sCn: 把两个都买下会不会太奢侈了？

synos.tran: 奢侈的；浪费的；过度的；放纵的

remMethod.val: extra(超过的) + vag(走) + ant → 走出正常的范围 → 放肆的， 过分的

words.tran: 奢侈，浪费；过度；放肆的言行

trans.tranCn: 放肆的， 过分的； 奢侈的， 铺张的
trans.tranOther: spending or costing a lot of money, especially more than is necessary or more than you can afford
